roleset.name: disagree, argue
roleset.note: DIFFER-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus, automatic expansion via verbnet. Member of VNcls battle-36.4-1. (from differ.01-v)

example.name: with prize
example.text: John differed with Mary over who deserved the last piece of cake.
example.arg: over who deserved the last piece of cake

roleset.name: be different, distinct, separate, unalike
roleset.note: DIFFER-V NOTES: Member of VNcls differ-23.4. (from differ.02-v)
DIFFERENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ data. Corresponds to differ-v.02 (battle-36.4-1). (from different.01-j)

role.descr: domain in which args 1 and 2 are different

example.name: differ from
example.text: Digital, Maynard, Mass., insisted yesterday that its marketing focus would differ sharply from IBM's.

example.name: merged differers, EXT
example.text: John and Mary's IQs differ by almost 50 points.

example.name: args 1, 3 and CAU
example.text: Why-1 are "put" and "but" different in their pronunciation [*-1] ?

example.name: arg3 as subject
example.text: In 1995 , China formally launched the policy " managing large enterprises well while adopting more flexible policies toward small ones , " and explained that the way the state - owned enterprises were reformed was different between China and the Eastern European countries .
example.arg: the way the state - owned enterprises were reformed
between China and the Eastern European countries
